channel.title: Another problem
channel.description:
Since my problem with silab still remains unfixed i've decided to start downloading updated clients with more silab items. I updated my java to 6.3 and now i get a problem with running any client or server:
[code]@echo off COLOR 09 title PhoneScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client[/code]
You should all know that it wont stay up so i add the @pause..
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/6092/wowoo1.jpg[/img][/URL]
Yeah.. erm the directory to my java is
C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_03\bin
